Package me.mayhem.util.ui

Interface Interactable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractKeyboardMouseInteractable, AbstractMouseInteractable, ButtonInteractable, HomePageLoadButton, HomePageNewGameButton, HomepageQuitButton, InputBox, LoadGameFileButton, LoadPageReturnButton, LoseNewGameButton, LoseReturnButton, NameSelectContinueButton, NextPageButton, PreviousPageButton, ReturnButton, ReturnButton, ReturnToGameButton, ReturnToMainMenuButton, SettingsPageEasyButton, SettingsPageHardButton, SettingsPageMediumButton, SettingsPageReturnButton, SettingsPageTutorialButton, TextAreaInteractable, TutorialReturnButton, WinContinueButton, WinSaveButton
public interface Interactable
An interface that flags a class as able to self-register and unregister a listener. Said listener is then later used to check if the relevant clicks are related to the object and as such call subsequent extended classes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Draws the stored button onto the target RenderWindow

    Updated the position of the shape on the screen
